snippet.title: Blokus™  Mobile game trailer by Gameloft
snippet.description:
NOW available on your mobile: http://www.gameloft.com/mobile-games/blokus/
Discover Blokus™: the most celebrated game of the century, now on your mobile with 4 game variations and a Hot Seat multiplayer mode!

Official site: http://www.gameloft.com
Friend us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/Gameloft
Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/Gameloft
Visit our blog: http://blog.gameloft.com
